version_description: Fixed unexpected app termination when touching the main edit screen when Touch Notation is run on the iPhone 6s/iPhone 6s Plus.
Improved accuracy of handwriting input when using iPad Pro + Apple Pencil.

- Improved recognition accuracy when writing certain numbers and symbols.
- Various other small fixes and improvements.

- Added support for entering and editing drum notation.
- Added 5 new score templates that include drum percussion.
- Added support for entering grace notes.
- Added support for writing abbreviation symbols.
- Added ability to resume score playback using a > gesture
- Various other small fixes.

- From this version of Touch Notation, the supported OS is iOS11 or later.
- Fixed an issue that prevented handwritten videos from playing correctly in the Help function.
- Fixed a bug that could cause some settings and properties such as tempo and font size to change to the minimum value when closing windows under iPadOS13.
- Various other bugs fixed.

- Added the ability to input lyrics.
- Added layout functions such as page break.
- When spacing with no measure selected, the vertical position of the staff and lyrics is now automatically adjusted.
- Various other bugs fixed.
Fixed an issue that prevented lyrics from outputting when exporting to PDF or printing.
